short_summary: The Canada Energy Regulator requires informatics professional services to supplement CER staff for Application / Software Architect and Cloud Architect services to meet its business and technical requirements
description: The Canada Energy Regulator has a requirement  for informatics professional services to supplement  the staffing needs of the CER. This is to support the architectural services requirements not met by CER staff.
duration_in_months: Now null definition but expected to send dateDebutContratPrevue & dateFinContratPrevue responses indicating when optionally it will starts when it will end.
